hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Skull Mask#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals the #Lost Woods Stage#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Please don't abandon this seed. Our world deserves saving!

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest
